wxIFM Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
wxIFMActivateEventUsed to notify plugins that the interface's parent window is [de]activating
wxIFMAddChildEventEvent class WXDLLIMPEXP_IFM for adding child windows to an interface
wxIFMAddTopContainerEvent
wxIFMBeginPaintEventEvent used to signify that painting is beginning. The purpose of this event is to create a DC on which to paint. It will be cleaned up with a wxIFMEndPaintEvent
wxIFMCalcRectsEventUsed to calculate the sizes and positions of children of a given component
wxIFMCaptionConfig
wxIFMChildDataBase
wxIFMChildEventBase class WXDLLIMPEXP_IFM used for some child window related events
wxIFMComponentClass representing a generic component in the interface
wxIFMComponentButtonEvent
wxIFMComponentButtonManagerClass for managing small buttons that appear for a component
wxIFMComponentVisibilityChangedEventNotifies a component that its visibility state is changed
wxIFMContainerData
wxIFMConvertRectEventUsed to convert between coord systems (absolute, background, client)
wxIFMCreateFloatingWindowEventUsed to create a window to float a component
wxIFMDefaultChildData
wxIFMDefaultContainerPlugin
wxIFMDefaultDockingPlugin
wxIFMDefaultInterfacePlugin
wxIFMDefaultPanelPlugin
wxIFMDefaultPlugin
wxIFMDefaultResizePlugin
wxIFMDeleteComponentEventEvent class WXDLLIMPEXP_IFM for deleting components
wxIFMDestroyFloatingWindowEventUsed to delete floating windows
wxIFMDimensions
wxIFMDockEventEvent to dock a component into another component
wxIFMDockEventEx
wxIFMDragEvent
wxIFMEndPaintEventEvent used to clean up a DC that was created by wxIFMBeginPaintEvent
wxIFMExtensionDataBase
wxIFMExtensionPluginBase
wxIFMFloatEventUsed to float or unfloat components
wxIFMFloatingData
wxIFMFloatingFrame
wxIFMFloatingMoveEventEvent to signify that a floating window has been moved or is being moved
wxIFMFloatingSizeEventEvent to signify that a floating window has been sized or is being sized
wxIFMFloatingWindowBase
wxIFMFloatNotifyEventUsed to notify a component that it has been docking into a floating window
wxIFMFocusEventGenerated when the interface's parent window recieves EVT_SETFOCUS or EVT_KILLFOCUS
wxIFMHitTestEventUsed to test if a given position is within a given coordinate system for a component
wxIFMInitDragEvent
wxIFMInterfacePluginBase
wxIFMKeyEventEvent for keyboard input messages
wxIFMMouseEventEvent for mouse input messages
wxIFMNewComponentEventEvent class WXDLLIMPEXP_IFM for creating interface components
wxIFMPaintEventEvent to paint components
wxIFMPaintInterfaceEventNotifies plugins that some or all of the interface needs to be repainted
wxIFMPanelData
wxIFMPanelTabData
wxIFMPluginEventIFM event base class
wxIFMQueryChildEventUsed to query information on a given child window. This event is used to determine if a child window is hidden or shown within the interface
wxIFMRectEventEvents to set and get absolute, client, and background rects
wxIFMRemoveTopContainerEvent
wxIFMResizeData
wxIFMResizeEvent
wxIFMSelectTabEvent
wxIFMSetChildEventUsed to set the children of components
wxIFMSetChildSizeEventUsed to change minimum, maximum, and desired sizes of a child window
wxIFMSetCursorEventEvent for EVT_SET_CURSOR
wxIFMShowChildEventUsed to hide or show child windows managed by the interface
wxIFMShowComponentEventThis event is used to show or hide a component
wxIFMShowDropTargetsEventEvent for positioning drop target buttons. This event specifies the component that the mouse is hovering over, which is the component that the "cross" drop target buttons should be positioned over. The component actually being dragged is specified by GetDraggedComponent
wxIFMTab
wxIFMTabConfig
wxIFMUndockEventEvent for undocking components
wxIFMUpdateComponentEventEvent for updating a component
wxIFMUpdateConfigEvent
wxIFMUpdateEventEvent for updating the interface
wxIFMUpdateResizeSashEvent
wxIFMVersionInfo
wxInterfaceManager
